P仔 頂爛市參考價 ：
乜都唔識 + HD： 14k - 15k
識少少 + HD： 16k-18k
u grad + 白紙： 16k~18k
u grad + 有intern/相關pt/freelance exp : 19k ~21k

----------------------------某IT手足金句------------------------------------


-----------------------------------IT真實行情---------------------------------------
----------------廣告1: Cyber Universal Company Limited-------------------------

早前我去一間係尖沙咀,叫"Cyber Universal Company Limited. 新意環球有限公司"見programmer
問起我點解想離開上一間公司
我同佢講因為上一間公司成日開OT,令我好難半工讀到
佢竟然好串咁話:
我地間公司成日都做到8,9點架啦!!好多時星期六、日都要OT返工!!
你想準時放工去讀書?去做保安啦你!!
保安咪準時放工收工後乜都唔洗理囉!!
你走得架啦!!
轉行做保安啦!!
果刻火到拍枱起身走

你地日日開OT=好威同正常?
係你地管理同能力問題吓?
垃圾港資扮大牌!!
見佢地日日登jobsdb,繼續登多幾年jobsdb啦!!

------------------------------廣告2: Macroxxxw----------------------------------------------------
冇自己位不在話下, 但有勁污糟既位俾你用
男人去廁所要去出面熱到仆街既公廁，女人就有公司廁所
Director 加丁點人工 = 俾機會你進步
打工學野係要交學費
落左site做野唔係公司 = 你放緊假好撚得閒
7 x 24 oncall is a must
例牌要OT做野
Sales 不嬲當Enginee 仔狗咁撚,客一投訴就送呢樣送果樣俾佢, 務求使撚死班Enginee 仔

「
xxxxxview, 最近爆左單野, 話說某間酒店同佢買 Cisco Main, 年年比足錢, 但是 Macrovxxx 冇同 Cisco 買, 變相自己白袋左筆錢 ... 最近間酒店轉 Vendor 先發現原來一直都冇同 Cisco 買 Main. 最後出 Legal 告 9 佢 ...

呢間正一仆街來, Sale 屎十問九唔應, E-mail 唔復, 甚至搵佢續 Main 都唔理我 ... 好明顯睇唔上我呢 D 細公司, 人手唔夠, 真係盞做死下面班細 ...

不過下面班細幾好, 落 case, 比埋 S/N, 幾個鐘內就有人復 ... 起碼都叫做有人跟下, 有人比我屌下 ...
」
----------------------------仆街公司/agent(係鍾意開名呀吹咩)-------------------------------
九巴,國泰,匯豐, pccw, jos, macroview
Adeeco, Seamatch, Manpowerundefined

不嬲覺得香港D毒撚痴撚線
搞program又搞埋infra果份
以為自己識好多電腦skills好撚勁
試過見過毒撚為左鬥個project bugs
飯都唔食都繼續鬥落去
放工時間又唔放工
8個鐘對著電腦眼都唔盲?

你話逗30,40k好正常
逗果10零16k咁真係痴閪線
8個鐘寫一個冇人用既function
大project d code，要1個16k既code狗出盡渾身解數好大機會係infar／OO／一開始normalization 已經做得唔好，一係就個code狗on9連hashmap都唔識用
normalization 好難
我地公司有個system， 1.1 上 1.2 enhancement delay左9個月，太撚多bug，但係d ba已經做緊1.3 version既野

做唔好normalization 咪咁羅

點為之好既normalization ？ 我做親果啲project都係用條key join到就算，不過見到明明link左 key但仲有幾個column係喺果邊抄過黎 既 真係屌左出聲，backend啲code亂到仆街

Support: Design, resource, monitor, and execute within the Company’s desktop and remote support machinery, ensuring that it achieves rapid and high-quality resolution, constantly improves based on metric-driven reporting, and supports all stages of the employee lifecycle, including on-boarding, intra-office moves, inter-office travel and relocation, and off-boarding.


Purchasing and online services management: Appropriately scope areas requiring external products and services; prepare RFPs where relevant; manage tender processes and benchmarking, ensure value and cost-efficiency in all vendor relationships; manage smooth implementation of new products and services; develop and maintain a global asset register of hardware, software, and IT service contracts; monitor products, services, and contracts versus SLAs and agreed T&Cs.

Team: On-board, integrate, train, develop, and manage a team of support personnel


Infrastructure: Design and execute IT infrastructure roadmap for the firm, creating an integrated, reliable, secure, efficient, and cost-effective set of systems that meet business needs; issue debriefs after all major outages, and implement corrective and preventative measures accordingly; oversee detailed design and build of IT components of real estate projects, and ensure seamless relocation.

Work closely with the Software Engineering team to ensure synergy and synchronisation in areas of mutual importance, including support and new product rollouts

Training: Design and implement training programmes for the wider firm to drive productivity and efficiency; design and implement training programmes to develop support personnel


Global alignment: working as an integral part of the global Technical Operations team to ensure global alignment of systems and processes, and to drive global projects



Requirements:

4+ years of relevant experience in similar roles (Apple Genius, Help desk, etc)
Excellent understanding of computer hardware, networking, OS X and G Suite
Evidenced problem-solving skills, comfortable navigating ambiguity
Thrives in a results-oriented, fast-paced environment
Bachelor’s Degree
